Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: News media reports: In recent times the people of Australia have been buzzing with reports that the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) is set to undergo a sweeping overhaul to ensure it is fit for the future. The review suggests broad changes to the RBA's governance and decision-making structures with the establishment of a new monetary policy board featuring more diverse members to improve decision-making quality. While details of the overhaul have not been revealed many speculate that this could be the biggest change to the RBA in decades.
